attributes.action: Endorse a Movement to Create a Memorial to WW2 Evacuees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the "forgotten ones" have not forgotten each other. The fact that there are online chat and support groups, with members worldwide, indicate the deep scarring produced by the psycholigical and often physical damage that has remained with us through out our lives. Our sacrifices were just as great and we have lived with the results for 60+ years. We need to be remembered, and then perhaps the healing will begin.
